title: pkgdown example
text:
preview(ast: dc.Object | ds.Docstring | object, max_depth=999)
Print a friendly representation of a griffe object (e.g. function, docstring)


>>> from quartodoc import get_object
>>> obj = get_object("quartodoc", "get_object")
>>> preview(obj.docstring.parsed)
 ...
>>> preview(obj)
 ...

title: pkgdown example
text:
These functions inspect and parse docstrings.



get_object
Fetch a griffe object.


preview
Print a friendly representation of a griffe object (e.g. function, docstring)

title: pkgdown example
text:
get_object(module: str, object_name: str, parser: str = 'numpy', load_aliases=True, modules_collection: None | ModulesCollection = None)
Fetch a griffe object.





Name
Type
Description
Default




module
str
A module name.
required


object_name
str
A function name.
required


parser
str
A docstring parser to use.
'numpy'


load_aliases

For aliases that were imported from other modules, should we load that module?
True


modules_collection
None
ModulesCollection
A griffe , used to hold loaded modules.






get_function: a deprecated function.



>>> get_function("quartodoc", "get_function")
<Function('get_function', ...
